events.name: Enabling IoT with Huawei- Inviting IoT Applications for i5Lab
events.description: Huawei is one of the leading organisations driving IoT ecosystem and agenda globally.  They provide not only the tools and technology, but a collaborative ecosystem to build the solutions together. Visit following to learn more about: • Huawei's IoT • IoT Solutions Case studies In this session Huawei team will share its technology, solutions, integration services and support for the development of IoT Applications.   Also many of you may know that Huawei, in partnership with NUS Enterprise, is creating an Internet-of-Things (IoT) start-up accelerator, i5Lab, to bring Startups/SMEs into the marketplace quickly, and link them to the larger IoT ecosystem. The call for proposal is still open, but ending soon!  For details, please visit i5Lab page and submit your ideas.<a href="http://i5lab.sg/"></a> ************************************************************ DATE & AGENDA: Monday, 13th Feb 2017 • 06:00 pm – Registration & Networking over snacks (sponsored by Huawei) • 06:45 pm – Introduction by CK  • 07:00 pm – Talk by K K Chang (Huawei's IoT Solutions approach, NB-IoT, introduction to i5)  • 07:45 pm – Panel Discussion & QnA  • 08:15 pm - Networking continued ************************************************************  VENUE: NUS Enterprise@Blk71, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent #02-01, SG139951 ************************************************************  Note: Please note that photography and videography will be carried out throughout the event.  IoT SG, Event Sponsors, Supporters may use some or all of these images in its print publications, digital, social platforms and/or marketing channels. We also ask some personal information and questions during registration. This data is used to do further due diligence to improve the quality of events. This data may also be shared with sponsoring organisations, speakers to help them to collaborate more efficiently. We do not sell your data.
events.location: NUS Enterprise@Blk71, 71 Ayer Rajah Crescent, #02-01, Singapore 139951

events.name: Social Coding
events.description: A space for women coders to learn from each other, to practice and discuss learnings with fellow peers. This would be a weekly event of informal space to do coding. So bring your pet projects along or join one of our existing teams/ projects to work on. Featured Projects:https://trello.com/b/kl2BTwil/wwc-sg-social-coding-projects Please bring your own laptop. Agenda:6:45p - Introduce projects from members6:55p - Break out into groups7:00p - Start coding! ^_^8:30p - End session There is no food provided, so please make preparations to grab a bite before you turn up. Also, we recommend to bring your own water bottle along. Psst, this event is intended for ladies only. Host:
events.location: #03-04, IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre, Singapore 188969., IDA Labs@NDC 111 Middle Road, National Design Centre

events.name: WordPress Meetup (February 2017)
events.description: Some of our friends from Automattic, the people behind WordPress.com, will be in town this February, and we'll have some great talks from them! Setting up a WooCommerce Store in 30 mins or lessGabriel Maldonado, Happiness Engineer at WordPress.com Creating your first child themeGaurav Pareek, Happiness Engineer at WordPress.com Community Open Space: Let us know if you have questions or topics you would like to bring up. There will be experts & enthusiasts present will answer questions. This will be casual. Possible topics could be: • What makes a good theme? • My site loads slow, how do I make it faster?  • And more (just comment)  Are you interested in sharing something about WordPress as well? Let us know!  Do join us from 7pm for a 7:30pm start. We're always looking for speakers and volunteers to help with our meetups! Please contact us if you're interested in helping out.  General Assembly is sponsoring our location and some drinks this month. Please do get a quick bite
events.location: General Assembly @ Spacemob, 8 Claymore Hill, Singapore 229572
